content: संबाध {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Thronged or crowded with, blocked up, narrow; संबाधं बृहदपि तद्बभूव वर्त्म <ls>Śi. 8. 2</ls>; व्योम्नि संबाधवर्त्मभिः <ls>R. 12. 67</ls>; अनेकसिद्धसाध्यसंबाधं <ls>K.</ls> --धः {@--1@} Being thronged with. {@--2@} Pressing on, striking, hurting; स्तनसंबाधमुरो जघान च <ls>Ku. 4. 26.</ls> {@--3@} Obstruction, difficulty, danger, impediment; <ls>Ki. 3. 53.</ls> {@--4@} The road to hell. {@--5@} Fear, dread. {@--6@} The vulva.
